Creation of unusual files or executables.Data: Windows Event ID 4663, Windows Event ID 4688
Creation of unusual files or executables.Action: Identify default and custom security software (AV/EDR) file/folder exclusion paths across endpoints and servers. Monitor Windows Event ID 4663 (File write) and 4688 (Process creation) for events occurring within these identified paths. Apply filtering to identify file types or names that are not typically found or expected in these exclusion directories. Use frequency analysis to spot rare or unique file writes in these paths.

Execution or modification activity origi.Data: Windows Event ID 4688, Windows Event ID 4663
Execution or modification activity origi.Action: Identify default and custom security software (AV/EDR) file/folder exclusion paths. Monitor Windows Event ID 4688 for process creations where the parent process path is within an exclusion directory or the process image path is within an exclusion directory. Monitor Windows Event ID 4663 for read/write/modify operations on files within exclusion paths by unexpected processes. Use correlation analysis to link process activity (4688) with file access events (4663) within the exclusion zones.
